output.channel.name: INI IntelliSense
statusbar.schema.loaded.tooltip:
INI Schema Loaded: {0}
Click to change the schema file.
statusbar.schema.notLoaded.tooltip: INI Schema not loaded. Click to select your INICodingCheck.ini file.
schema.load.success: Custom INI schema file loaded successfully: {0}
schema.load.failure: Failed to load the specified INI schema file: {0}.
debug.openFileFirst: Please open an INI file before running this command.
debug.title: --- INI IntelliSense Debug Info ---
debug.schema.loaded: ✅ Schema loaded: Found {0} registries in total.
debug.schema.idRegistriesFound: ✅ Identified {0} ID list registries for indexing:
debug.schema.noIdRegistries: ❌ Warning: No ID list registries identified from the schema. Type inference will fail.
debug.index.summary: ✅ Indexing complete: Found {0} unique registered section IDs across all files.
debug.context.title: --- Context Info ---
debug.context.noSection: Error: Cursor is not within a valid section.
debug.analysis.title: --- Type Inheritance & Key Analysis ---
debug.analysis.noKeys: ❌ Warning: No keys found for type '{0}' after analyzing inheritance chain.
debug.inference.failure: ❌ Error: Could not determine the type to analyze.
hover.override.info: This key overrides a value from base class in **{0}**:L{1}
completion.color.documentation: Enter an RGB color value, e.g., 255,0,0
diag.style.leadingWhitespace: Unnecessary leading whitespace at the beginning of the line.
diag.style.incorrectSpacesBeforeComment: There should be {0} space(s) before the comment character ";".
diag.style.missingSpaceAfterComment: There should be a space after the comment character ";".
diag.type.invalidInteger: Value "{0}" is not a valid integer.
diag.type.invalidFloat: Value "{0}" is not a valid floating-point number.
diag.type.numberOutOfRange: Value {0} is outside the allowed range [{1}, {2}] for type "{3}".
diag.type.valueNotInList: Value "{0}" is not one of the allowed values for type "{1}".
diag.type.invalidPrefix: Value "{0}" does not meet the prefix requirement for type "{1}".
diag.type.invalidSuffix: Value "{0}" does not meet the suffix requirement for type "{1}".
diag.type.listTooShort: Type "{0}" requires at least {1} value(s), but only {2} were provided.
diag.type.listTooLong: Type "{0}" requires at most {1} value(s), but {2} were provided.
diag.logic.undefinedSection: Definition for section "[{0}]" not found in the project.

validator.status.pathIsDirectory: The path points to a directory, not a file.
validator.status.pathNotFound: The path does not exist or is not accessible.
validator.status.invalid:
Error: The configured path is invalid. Click to fix.
Details: {0}
validator.status.unconfigured: Not configured. Click to set up.
validator.prompt.configure.message: INI Validator is not configured. Would you like to set it up to enable advanced diagnostics?

validator.run.notReady: INI Validator is not configured, cannot run validation.
validator.run.progress.title: Running INI Validator...
validator.run.folderNotSet: Mod validation root folder is not configured. Skipped INI Validator check.
